Question
========

A pure die is rolled four times. What is the probability that a two comes up at least once?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.482
* 0.518
* 0,999

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.482: Incorrect
* 0.518: Correct
* 0.999: Incorrect
